title: GodelAI: A C-S-P Framework for Wisdom-Preserving Language Models
description: GodelAI is an open-source small language model framework built on the C-S-P (Compression → State → Propagation) philosophy. This is a defensive publication establishing prior art for the C-S-P framework, including: (1) Gradient Diversity as a wisdom metric, (2) Sleep Protocol for model reflection, (3) Attribution-Aware Loss for ethical traceability, and (4) Propagation Layer Conservation for AI alignment.
notes: This is a defensive publication to establish prior art for the C-S-P (Compression-State-Propagation) framework and its technical implementations. The framework was developed through multi-model collaboration between ChatGPT, Gemini 2.5 Pro, Kimi K2, Grok, and Manus AI, orchestrated by Alton Lee.
